attributes.title: VB Performance Dashboard
attributes.description: VB Performance Dashboard â€” OKE / Oracle Cloud. Filter by Cluster, Namespace, Service, Environment, Node. Tracks P95, P99, Latency, Error Rate, Throughput, Apdex, Pod Health.
